title: Corra Snows Game - (PC-MAC)
description:
Help Snows in his adventure inspired by classic games of the genre platform.
Run Snows unites the best of the genre platform by adding gender elements "run" to have a more dynamic gameplay on mobile platform, and also has several unique features:

- Zoom Native System: For devices with small screen, or simply you have all pixel art of glamor on a large scale!

- ParallaxScrolling: The best use of scrolling system providing greater immersion and interaction in the palm of your hands.

- Dynamic Difficulty Levels: Run Snows you choose the best way go, casual gamers will choose the easy way, experienced players will be rewarded for their bold choices.

- Many Secrets: Discover the mysteries behind the next block or hidden paths ...

- Point + Points: Post your score with #corrasnows hashtag to compete with your friends!

- Much more: Download now and discover all the mysteries!

################################################## #####################################

Developer's Note: Run Snows was developed entirely by a single person who does not have the support of large corporations, all tests were made so you can have the best possible experience, but some events can not be predicted.

Good game!

--
